about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to become a Streamer? To show the world how skilful a gamer you are? Now you can! 

Gather the audience, watch them react to you playing. Make the stream entertaining by either looking cool and beating the game with ease OR rage and be memed by chat! All is in your hands!

You’re playing as CAPPA, hero from capybara legends. Your goal is to free every capybara in the world from the evil hands of World Zoo Inc. To help you achieve this goal you will be using arifact known only from ancient stories - The Ropegun. Use your fluffy body and springy rope to bounce around various traps and dangers that will try to stop you.

Remember though that you enabled Chaos Mode and your chat can vote for various effects. They can manipulate game logic, give you a needed boost or even make you blind! Will they help you beat the game? Or maybe they are cruel and try to sabotage your every attempt?

Fully Customize your StreamBara! Choose between various accessories, keyboards, mouses, backgrounds! Heck, you can even wear wacky costumes to make your chat laugh!

Connect your real audience from Twitch and have them vote for Chaos Mode. Now you really ARE a streamer!

Use your creativity to beat the game the fastest you can and compete with your friends in the Online ranking. Watch players from all around the world as they struggle to be the number 1 Giga Capy Chad in the world!

short_description: Prove every Capybara that you are a Gamer! As Capy-Streamer impress your Chat, get Subs and show off your skills in this 2D Platformer. You’re playing as CAPPA - an ancient Hero, in a quest to save capybaras from captivity. Use your trusty Ropegun to achieve your goal and defeat the evil ZOO.
